v2.0 - NEW BUILD SYSTEM - All dynamic binary files. If it works, I'll add more.
 - Added GCC 4.4.0 (arm-eabi-gcc)
 - Added 'make', 'ctags', and 'taglist' vim plugin.
 - Added 'links' console web browser (DNS works for this)
 - Fixed GIT, so that git-pull, push and merge now work! (Still no ssl, use ssh -L)
 - Added c/cpp examples. READ ALL THE HELP/TUTORIALS
 - Put cd $HOME back in .bashrc.. TMUX prefers it.
 
 v1.95 - Changed / Fixed ~/.bashrc
 - Paths now set in ~/.init. Not elongated every time you run bash.
 - TERM now set in ~/.init. Not reset when you start tmux (which works best/requires 'export TERM=screen' to render correctly)
 - cd $HOME now also done in ~/.init and not ~/.bashrc so that it's not reset every time you run another bash.
 - This will mean tmux and telnetd starting from the folder you are currently in when you run them.
 - To Update - either save your current config files and choose 'Overwrite all'.
 - or view the latest ~/.bashrc in ~/system/bashrc , and ~/.init, and then update yours.
 - or [basically] comment out the 'TERM', 'PATHs' and 'cd $HOME' lines in your ~/.bashrc
 
 v1.94 - Fixed jar signer issue with kenwood signer 1.1 replacement
 - htop 1.0 [update]
 - checkup - a simple script to tell a few things..
 - Fixed install issue on demos when run from inside vim (just added a 'cd' to start of script)
 - BACK can now be ESC. Press Menu. It's always OFF by default. (Only for use with hard keyboards)
 
 v1.92 - nano 2.2.6 [update]
